name: Billy Climbs A Mountain
description:
Our hero is Billy, the greatest goat of all time. Climb randomly generated mountains and avoid the traps that will try to get your goat!

To play simply download -> Unzip -> run BillyClimbsAMountain.exe

This is our submission to Gamerella Game Jam 2021.

A and D move left and right.  W and Space Bar to Jump. TAB opens the pause menu. Simply download and run the .exe to play. Some issues can be solved by installing the dependicies if required, but most should not need them. They are located in your downloaded folder under: 

BillyClimbsAMountain\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us
